item.title: Detecting C++ memory leaks in Visual Studio – again
item.description: I made a small post about detecting C++ memory leaks in Visual Studio in 2010. At the time that seemed to suffice, but some months ago someone told me about Visual Leak Detector and boy does it work. According to the website itself Visual Leak Detector is a free, robust, open-source memory leak detection system for Visual C++. Itâ€™s pretty easy to use. After installing it, you just need to tell Visual C++ where to find the included header and library file.
